greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Take the rightmost three binary digits of n (for n<4 padded with leading zeros) and rotate left 1 digit.
comment: permutation of natural numbers with inverse = A080414: A080414(a(n))=n, a(A080414(n))=n;
link: Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 17 2003
